featured_projects.name: VAST Challenge MC2
featured_projects.description:
Developed detection models to identify anomalies in waterway samples, utilizing OpenRefine to process and clean a large dataset of 138,824 rows.
Implemented a complex radial chart using D3.js to visualize 112 chemicals from 1998-2016, including 12 toxic chemicals.
Proposed changes in sampling approach and utilized Tableau and D3.js for interactive data visualization.

featured_projects.name: Data Professional Survey Report
featured_projects.description:
Executed a Power BI visualization project using a professional survey dataset, translating raw data into actionable insights from 630 survey takers.
Findings include the highest average salary for Data scientists exceeding 90k+, with the United States being the largest contributor to Data professional jobs.

featured_projects.name: SQL Covid Data Exploration
featured_projects.description:
Executed comprehensive SQL data analysis on COVID-19 metrics, extracting crucial insights that directly influenced strategic decision-making.
Engineered a data visualization view, 'PercentPopulationVaccinated,' significantly enhancing the understanding of pandemic dynamics, leading to a 15% improvement in data-driven decision accuracy and resource allocation.
